text.author: UC Santa barbara The American Presidency Project (ed. Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley)
text.title: Remarks Announcing Candidacy for President in New York City
text.summary: In a speech at Trump Tower, Donald Trump berates other candidates for the Presidency and criticizes US military losses in the Middle East, immigration from Mexico, the state of the US nuclear arsenal, and economic and job losses in comparison to China, Mexico and Japan.
